title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft operation on two lines of text that are indented with a combination of tabs and spaces, the text does not move. It appears that the first line is not shifted left and the second line is not shifted left at least to the first non-whitespace character.
EB: The expected behavior is that when executing the ShiftLeft operation on two lines of text that are indented with a combination of tabs and spaces, the first line should be shifted left and the second line should also be shifted left to align with the first non-whitespace character.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following:
   <space>
   <tab>some text
   <tab>some text2
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft operation.

Expected result: The two lines are indented the same visually and the text moves accordingly.

Actual result: Nothing moves.
